event.title: was founded by the governor Ángel de Peredo on October 12 1662

data.event: The first Spanish settlement, Santa Maria de Guadalupe, was founded by the governor Ángel de Peredo on October 12 1662 but it did not survive long amidst the hostilities of the Arauco War.

Lota also has Chile's oldest hydroelectric power station, the Chivilingo Hydroelectric Plant, designed by Thomas Edison and built in 1897.
